languages.text: Замершие корабли приходят в движение — не позволяя кораблю Вольного Торговца подойти ближе, они отлетают в сторону, будто бы желая сохранить дистанцию и остаться нетронутыми.

traits.locale_text: Замершие корабли приходят в движение — не позволяя кораблю Вольного Торговца подойти ближе, они отлетают в сторону, будто бы желая сохранить дистанцию и остаться нетронутыми.

languages.text: The frozen ships start moving. They scatter away from the Rogue Trader's flagship, avoiding it as best they can, as if wanting to keep their distance and remain untouched.
languages.original_text: Замершие корабли приходят в движение — не позволяя кораблю Вольного Торговца подойти ближе, они отлетают в сторону, будто бы желая сохранить дистанцию и остаться нетронутыми.

traits.locale_text: The frozen ships start moving. They scatter away from the Rogue Trader's ship, avoiding it as best they can, as if wanting to keep their distance and remain untouched.

The frozen ships start moving. They scatter away from the Rogue Trader's flagship, avoiding it as best they can, as if wanting to keep their distance and remain untouched.

languages.text: 原本一动不动的舰船开始移动，赶在行商浪人的旗舰接近之前四散开来，尽可能地躲避它。它们似乎是想努力保持距离，确保行商浪人不会接近他们。
languages.original_text: The frozen ships start moving. They scatter away from the Rogue Trader's flagship, avoiding it as best they can, as if wanting to keep their distance and remain untouched.

traits.locale_text: 原本一动不动的舰船开始移动，赶在行商浪人的旗舰接近之前四散开来，尽可能地躲避它。它们似乎是想努力保持距离，确保行商浪人不会接近他们。

languages.text: 凍りついた船が動き始める。彼らは自由開拓者の旗艦から離れて散り散りになり、あたかも距離を保って触れられないようにするかのように、旗艦から遠ざかる。
languages.original_text: The frozen ships start moving. They scatter away from the Rogue Trader's flagship, avoiding it as best they can, as if wanting to keep their distance and remain untouched.

traits.locale_text: 凍りついた船が動き始める。彼らは自由開拓者の旗艦から離れて散り散りになり、あたかも距離を保って触れられないようにするかのように、旗艦から遠ざかる。

languages.text: Las naves congeladas empiezan a moverse. Se dispersan lejos de la nave insignia {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, evitándola lo mejor que pueden, como si quisieran mantener las distancias y permanecer intactas.
languages.original_text: The frozen ships start moving. They scatter away from the Rogue Trader's flagship, avoiding it as best they can, as if wanting to keep their distance and remain untouched.

traits.locale_text: Las naves congeladas empiezan a moverse. Se dispersan lejos de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, evitándola lo mejor que pueden, como si quisieran mantener las distancias y permanecer intactas.

languages.text: Die eingefrorenen Schiffe beginnen sich zu bewegen. Sie huschen vom Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} fort und meiden dieses dabei, so gut sie können. Als würden sie Abstand halten und unberührt bleiben wollen.
languages.original_text: The frozen ships start moving. They scatter away from the Rogue Trader's flagship, avoiding it as best they can, as if wanting to keep their distance and remain untouched.

traits.locale_text: Die eingefrorenen Schiffe beginnen sich zu bewegen. Sie huschen vom Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} fort und meiden dieses dabei, so gut sie können. Als würden sie Abstand halten und unberührt bleiben wollen.

languages.text: Les vaisseaux jusqu'alors inertes s'ébranlent subitement et se dispersent pour semer le vaisseau amiral {mf|du libre-marchand|de libre-marchande}, l'évitant de leur mieux comme s'ils tenaient à tout prix à garder leurs distances de crainte de se faire attaquer.
languages.original_text: The frozen ships start moving. They scatter away from the Rogue Trader's flagship, avoiding it as best they can, as if wanting to keep their distance and remain untouched.

traits.locale_text: Les vaisseaux jusqu'alors inertes s'ébranlent subitement et se dispersent pour semer le vaisseau amiral {mf|du libre-marchand|de libre-marchande}, l'évitant de leur mieux comme s'ils tenaient à tout prix à garder leurs distances de crainte de se faire attaquer.

languages.text: Hareketsiz gemiler, hareket etmeye başlıyor. Hür Tacir'in sancak gemisinden uzaklaşarak mümkün olduğunca mesafeyi korumak ve temastan kaçınmak ister gibi dağılıyorlar.
languages.original_text: The frozen ships start moving. They scatter away from the Rogue Trader's flagship, avoiding it as best they can, as if wanting to keep their distance and remain untouched.
